aboutPage.aboutMe: I'm a software engineer specialised in frontend and backend development for complex scalable web apps. I worked on several enterprise applications, building my experience in big projects. I like developing stuff on my own, you can find some of my creations in my portfolio and online resume
aboutPage.body: Thanks for downloading this app, which was made with ♥
aboutPage.title: Antonino Samperi

app.name: Antonino Samperi
app.welcomeText: Hi, I'm Antonino Samperi and I'm a senior software engineer. Welcome to my personal website!

portfolioPage.title: web developer portfolio
portfolioPage.subtitle: From web components to Angular web apps and Node.JS. Here are some of my latest web software development projects.

resumePage.presentation: As software engeener my responsibilities include gathering user requirements, defining system functionality and writing code. I have a major experience in frontend technologies, like Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3, including related frameworks like Angular. I often develop rest services using languages like Javascript (NodeJS + Express), PHP, or Java (Spring Boot). I sometimes deal with UI design and UX requirements, like developing wireframes and prototypes (Adobe XD). My goal is to build high-quality, innovative and fully performing software that complies with coding standards and technical design.
resumePage.title: resume
